Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil, Organic Rose Hips Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Corylus Americana (American Hazel) Seed Oil, C13-15 Alkane, Azadirachta Indica (Neem) Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Organic Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Oleoresin and Tocopherol (Vitamin E)

chunk: Directions: Massage small amount of serum over clean face and neck, twice daily.
